籤詩版本二:
The whale remains unchanged in the river
Can't rise higher and hope higher
Extraordinary changes in the future
Xu Jun jumped over the dragon gate
詩意: This hexagram shows the unchanged image of the whale. Be patient until the time comes.
解曰: You have to endure it. Be patient and patient. Have to wait until the time comes. The fame is still there.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
During the Warring States Period, Su Qin, a native of Luoyang, worshiped Gui Guzi as his teacher.
Su Qin lobbied the King of Qin and wrote twelve times, but the King of Qin did not accept his argument. When he returned home, his fur coat was torn and he had run out of money. He arrived at the door haggard. His wife ignored him and his sister-in-law did not cook for him.
Su Qin was ashamed and angry, so he got the Taigong Yin Fu (book on the art of war) and read it angrily. When you feel confused and lazy, just prick your thigh with an awl and read again when it hurts.
Later, the theory of He Cong (He Zong) was used to unite the six countries against Qin. He lobbied King Zhao and became the prime minister of the six countries.
聖意:
The house is uneasy.

Asking for money and lacking profit.
